lyrics:
16 contributorsflathead lyricsverse 1
well just because she feeds me well
and she made me talk dirty in a pink hotel
it doesnt mean shes got eyes for me
she might just want my bones you see
and hey flathead dont you get mean
shes the second best killer that i ever have seen
they dont come much more sick than you
i could go on if you want me to
its just so wrong so very nice
and i told you once and you killed me twice
i saw you one time at the back of the club
chewing on glass and a ticket stub

prechorus 1
said i heard they kicked the boy til he bled
then stood and said oh my god til she said

chorus
bada dop da da da da da
bada dop da da da da da
bada dop da da da da da
bada dop da da da da da
bada dop da da da da da
bada dop da da da da da
bada dop da da da da da
bada dop da da da da da
you might also likeverse 2
well everybody knows youre the one to call
when the girls get ugly round the back of the wall
and josephine says you got a bleeding nose
taking it with her or wherever she goes
and hey flathead dont check me in
well hers is a tonic and mine is a gin
they dont come much more slick than you
id drive your car if you ask me to

prechorus 2
said the boys not right in the head
and you stood and got a kicking instead til she said
